definition[0]: a ticket that allows you to make a lot of journeys during a particular period of time, or go to all the games, concerts etc being held during a particular time. Season tickets cost less than it would cost to buy a ticket for each journey, game etc
note[0]: season ticket holder (=someone who owns a season ticket)
definition[1]: a ticket for several journeys, performances, games etc that costs less than paying separately each time
example[1]: a season ticket holder (=someone who has one)
